attributes.action: Appoint Sadiq Khan as the new UK ambassador to the United States of America.
attributes.background:
Sir Kim Darroch has unfortunately resigned from his post as the UK ambassador to the United States.

As a new ambassador is required we, the undersigned, believe that the ideal candidate for the post is the current mayor of London Sadiq Khan.

rejection.details: We can’t accept petitions about honours and appointments, this includes petitions asking for people to be given particular jobs.
